title: Over 90 Killed, 50 Injured After Fuel Tanker Explodes In Nigeria
content: A fuel tanker explosion in northern Nigeria has killed at least 94 people and left 50 injured, police said on Wednesday.
summary: A fuel tanker explosion in northern Nigeria has killed at least 94 people and left 50 injured, police said on Wednesday.

title: Inside China's Underground Lab Tasked With Solving A Physics Mystery
content: A giant sphere 700 m (2,300 ft) underground with thousands of light-detecting tubes will be sealed in a 12-storey cylindrical pool of water in coming months for an experiment that will shine new light on elusive subatomic particles called neutrinos.
summary: A giant sphere 700 m (2,300 ft) underground with thousands of light-detecting tubes will be sealed in a 12-storey cylindrical pool of water in coming months for an experiment that will shine new light on elusive subatomic particles called neutrinos.

title: Why Is North Korea Blowing Up Roads, Railways To The South?
content: Dynamiting inter-Korea roads and railways. Threatening war over drone incursions and moving nuclear-capable weapons to the border. North Korea appears very unhappy with the South at the moment.
summary: Dynamiting inter-Korea roads and railways. Threatening war over drone incursions and moving nuclear-capable weapons to the border. North Korea appears very unhappy with the South at the moment.

title: Hong Kong Busts Deepfake Scam, $46 Million Stolen In Romance Fraud
content: The group, targeting men from Taiwan to Singapore and as far away as India, used AI-powered deepfakes to run a fraudulent cryptocurrency platform.
summary: The group, targeting men from Taiwan to Singapore and as far away as India, used AI-powered deepfakes to run a fraudulent cryptocurrency platform.

title: "SCO Can't Be Built On Unilateral Agendas": S Jaishankar Top 5 Quotes In Pak

title: 5 Indians Killed In Car Crash In Texas, 3 Were From Andhra Pradesh
content: Five Indians, including three from Andhra Pradesh, died in a horrific road accident near Randolph, Texas in the United States of America (USA), on Sunday.
summary: Five Indians, including three from Andhra Pradesh, died in a horrific road accident near Randolph, Texas in the United States of America (USA), on Sunday.

title: Bodies Of 5 Russians Retrieved From Worlds 7th-Highest Mountain In Daring Op
content: The five Russians went missing on October 6 during an attempt to summit the world's seventh-highest mountain Dhaulagiri, an 8,167-metre (26,795-foot) Himalayan peak.
summary: The five Russians went missing on October 6 during an attempt to summit the world's seventh-highest mountain Dhaulagiri, an 8,167-metre (26,795-foot) Himalayan peak.

title: Discovery Of Antarctic Explorer's Lost Shipwreck To Be Revealed On Screen
content: Legendary Antarctic explorer Ernest Shackleton's ship Endurance sank more than a century ago and its wreck lay undiscovered at the bottom of the Weddell Sea until March 2022.
summary: Legendary Antarctic explorer Ernest Shackleton's ship Endurance sank more than a century ago and its wreck lay undiscovered at the bottom of the Weddell Sea until March 2022.

title: EU Won't Pull Back UN Troops From South Lebanon, Austrian Minister Says
content: EU countries that contribute to UN peacekeeping force UNIFIL in Lebanon have no intention of pulling back from south Lebanon of the country despite Israeli calls.
summary: EU countries that contribute to UN peacekeeping force UNIFIL in Lebanon have no intention of pulling back from south Lebanon of the country despite Israeli calls.

title: "Imran Khan Kept In Solitary Confinement, Literally In Dark," Says Ex-Wife
content: The ex-wife of Pakistan's former prime minister Imran Khan called for his immediate release, citing "serious and concerning" reports about his treatment in prison.
summary: The ex-wife of Pakistan's former prime minister Imran Khan called for his immediate release, citing "serious and concerning" reports about his treatment in prison.

title: Fake Artificial Intelligence Might Be Clouding Your View Of The Past
content: A wave of touching photos showing great moments in time is fascinating to amateur historians online. The problem? They are not real and maybe cloud our view of the past.
summary: A wave of touching photos showing great moments in time is fascinating to amateur historians online. The problem? They are not real and maybe cloud our view of the past.

title: Indian Man Breaks World Record With The Smallest Washing Machine Ever
content: Indian engineer Sebin Saji has set a Guinness World Record by creating the world's smallest functioning washing machine, measuring just 1.28 by 1.32 by 1.52 inches.
summary: Indian engineer Sebin Saji has set a Guinness World Record by creating the world's smallest functioning washing machine, measuring just 1.28 by 1.32 by 1.52 inches.

title: Giant Pandas Flown To US From China Aboard 'Panda Express'
content: Two giant pandas arrived at the Washington zoo on Tuesday in the latest chapter in China's campaign of international "panda diplomacy."
summary: Two giant pandas arrived at the Washington zoo on Tuesday in the latest chapter in China's campaign of international "panda diplomacy."

title: Opinion: Nijjar Row: How US Backing Has Emboldened A Beleaguered Trudeau
content: With two broad factors  US backing and foreign interference closely associated with the Nijjar killing, the Justin Trudeau government in Canda is making drastic and dramatic moves against India.
summary: With two broad factors  US backing and foreign interference closely associated with the Nijjar killing, the Justin Trudeau government in Canda is making drastic and dramatic moves against India.

title: Tsavo Man-Eaters: Centuries-Old Lion Teeth Reveal Shocking New Details
content: This study not only identifies the specific animals the lions preyed on but also provides clues as to why they targeted humans.
summary: This study not only identifies the specific animals the lions preyed on but also provides clues as to why they targeted humans.

title: 'Mysterious Black Balls' Spotted At Sydney Beaches
content: Hundreds of mysterious black tar-like balls have washed up on two popular Sydney beaches, prompting lifeguards to close the strands to swimmers.
summary: Hundreds of mysterious black tar-like balls have washed up on two popular Sydney beaches, prompting lifeguards to close the strands to swimmers.

title: On Nijjar Killing, US Says "Wanted To See India, Canada Cooperate But..."
content: The United States has called on India to cooperate with Canada's investigation into "extremely serious allegations" linking "agents" of the Indian government with the killing of Khalistani terrorist and Canadian citizen Hardeep Singh Nijjar.
summary: The United States has called on India to cooperate with Canada's investigation into "extremely serious allegations" linking "agents" of the Indian government with the killing of Khalistani terrorist and Canadian citizen Hardeep Singh Nijjar.

title: Air India's Latest Update Day After Hoax Call Grounded Its Jet In Canada
content: A Canadian Air Force aircraft is ferrying 191 stranded passengers of an Air India flight from Iqaluit airport to Chicago, more than 18 hours after the flight was diverted to the airport due to a bomb threat.
summary: A Canadian Air Force aircraft is ferrying 191 stranded passengers of an Air India flight from Iqaluit airport to Chicago, more than 18 hours after the flight was diverted to the airport due to a bomb threat.

title: European Union AI Act Checker Reveals Big Tech's Compliance Pitfalls
content: Some of the most prominent artificial intelligence models are falling short of European regulations in key areas such as cybersecurity resilience and discriminatory output, according to data seen by Reuters.
summary: Some of the most prominent artificial intelligence models are falling short of European regulations in key areas such as cybersecurity resilience and discriminatory output, according to data seen by Reuters.

title: Canada Marine Protection Plan Aims To Serve As Global Model
content: Viewed from above, Canada's newest Marine Protected Area (MPA) is deceptively simple: stretches of blue Pacific Ocean waters and a few patches of green forest.
summary: Viewed from above, Canada's newest Marine Protected Area (MPA) is deceptively simple: stretches of blue Pacific Ocean waters and a few patches of green forest.
